item.title: Thank You!
item.dc:creator: d_talmatch_dude
item.content:encoded:
Your Gift Card Order Is Complete!

Your North Point gift card order is on it’s way!

If you chose the pickup option, your gift card(s) will be held for you at the restaurant.  Stop by during regular business hours or call us to arrange for pick-up.

Please contact us by email, or give us a call (207) 899-3778 with any questions.

item.title: Welcome to The North Point
item.dc:creator: d_talmatch_dude
item.content:encoded:
THE NORTH POINT
PORTLAND, MAINE

"Fine Food and Drink ~ Old Fashioned Friendly Service"

Oct. 12, 2024: The North Point has closed it's doors for the last time. This decision wasn't made lightly, but was made in light of rising costs, difficulty staffing, and generally decreasing sales.

More info will follow, but for now, I want to offer my thanks and appreciation to all that have made The North Point a Portland staple for nearly 12 years. We're still loving you right back!
-dan
